title: [The Rift, Scatter]
description: Skeletal birds circle a giant black marble statue depicting a winged demon.  The earth at the feet of the statuary has been frozen solid, all plant and animal life encased in a thick layer of ice.  A bluish mist lingers in the air, ebbing and flowing like the tide over time.

Skeletal birds circle a giant black marble statue depicting a winged demon.  The earth at the feet of the statuary has been scorched of all life, both plant and animal.  A reddish mist lingers in the air, ebbing and flowing like the tide over time.
